query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
1 «S’io ti fiammeggio nel caldo d’amore 2 di là dal modo che ’n terra si vede, 3 sì che del viso tuo vinco il valore,
query.error: **English:** 1 "If I inflame you with the heat of love 2 beyond the way that is seen on earth, 3 so that I overcome the power of your sight,
query.result: 1 "Yadi aham tava premaṇasya uṣṇatāyām tvām prajvalayāmi 2 tataḥ param yat prithivyām dṛśyate, 3 yathā tava mukhaśriyaḥ aham jayāmi,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
4 non ti maravigliar, ché ciò procede 5 da perfetto veder, che, come apprende, 6 così nel bene appreso move il piede.
query.error: **English:** 4 do not marvel, for this proceeds 5 from perfect seeing, which, as it apprehends, 6 so moves the foot in the good that is apprehended.
query.result: 4 na āścaryam kuru, yataḥ etat sambhavati 5 pūrṇa darśanāt, yat yathā abhyasyati, 6 tathā śubhe abhyaste caraṇam calayati.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
7 Io veggio ben sì come già resplende 8 ne l’intelletto tuo l’etterna luce, 9 che, vista, sola e sempre amore accende;
query.error: **English:** 7 I see well how the eternal light 8 already shines in your intellect, 9 which, seen, alone and always kindles love;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
10 e s’altra cosa vostro amor seduce, 11 non è se non di quella alcun vestigio, 12 mal conosciuto, che quivi traluce.
query.error: **English:** 10 and if something else seduces your love, 11 it is nothing but some trace of that, 12 poorly understood, which shines through here.
query.result: 10 api ca yadi anyad vastu tava premaṃ mohayati, 11 na asti tat kiṃcid api tatasyaiveṣaṃ, 12 durjñātam, yat tatra prakāśate.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
13 Tu vuo’ saper se con altro servigio, 14 per manco voto, si può render tanto 15 che l’anima sicuri di letigio».
query.error: **English:** 13 You want to know if with another service, 14 through a lesser vow, one can render so much 15 that the soul can be assured of no dispute.
query.result: 13 Tvam icchasi jñātum kim anyena sevayā, 14 alpatareṇa vratena, śakyate tāvat kartum 15 yena ātmā niścitaḥ syāt vivādābhāvāt.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
16 Sì cominciò Beatrice questo canto; 17 e sì com’ uom che suo parlar non spezza, 18 continüò così ’l processo santo:
query.error: **English:** 16 Beatrice began this song; 17 and like one who does not break off his speech, 18 she continued thus the holy discourse:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
19 «Lo maggior don che Dio per sua larghezza 20 fesse creando, e a la sua bontate 21 più conformato, e quel ch’e’ più apprezza,
query.error: **English:** 19 "The greatest gift that God in his bounty 20 made in creating, and to his goodness 21 most conformed, and that which he most prizes,
query.result: 19 Yaḥ varīyān dānaṃ yaḥ Dēvaḥ svakīyayā audāryēṇa 20 Cakāra sṛṣṭvā, ca svakīyayā śubhatayā 21 Adhikaṃ samānaṃ, ca yaḥ saḥ adhikaṃ mūlyavān karoti,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
22 fu de la volontà la libertate; 23 di che le creature intelligenti, 24 e tutte e sole, fuoro e son dotate.
query.error: **English:** 22 was the freedom of the will; 23 with which intelligent creatures, 24 and all and only they, were and are endowed.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
25 Or ti parrà, se tu quinci argomenti, 26 l’alto valor del voto, s’è sì fatto 27 che Dio consenta quando tu consenti;
query.error: **English:** 25 Now you will understand, if you reason about this, 26 the high value of the vow, if it is made 27 in such a way that God consents when you consent;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
28 ché, nel fermar tra Dio e l’omo il patto, 29 vittima fassi di questo tesoro, 30 tal quale io dico; e fassi col suo atto.
query.error: **English:** 28 because, in making the pact between God and man, 29 you make a victim of this treasure, 30 just as I say; and you do so with your own act.
query.result: 28 yasmāt, Devena saha naraḥ samayaṃ kurvatā, 29 ayam nidhiḥ vikrīyate, 30 tathā yathā aham bruve; ayam ca svakīyena karmaṇā vikrīyate.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
31 Dunque che render puossi per ristoro? 32 Se credi bene usar quel c’hai offerto, 33 di maltolletto vuo’ far buon lavoro.
query.error: **English:** 31 So what can you give me in return? 32 If you truly believe you can use what I have offered, 33 you can turn bad grain into good work.
query.result: 31 Tasmāt kim dātum śaknoṣi pratyupāyaṃ me? 32 Yadi viśvasasi yathārtham upayogituṃ yat tvayā prayacchitam, 33 durbhaktāt sukr̥tam kartum icchasi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
34 Tu se’ omai del maggior punto certo; 35 ma perché Santa Chiesa in ciò dispensa, 36 che par contra lo ver ch’i’ t’ho scoverto,
query.error: **English:** 34 You are now certain of the highest point; 35 but why does Holy Church grant a dispensation in this, 36 which seems contrary to the truth that I have revealed to you,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
37 convienti ancor sedere un poco a mensa, 38 però che ’l cibo rigido c’hai preso, 39 richiede ancora aiuto a tua dispensa.
query.error: **English:** 37 you must still sit down at the table for a while, 38 because the hard food that you have taken 39 still requires help from your pantry.
query.result: 37 tava api alpam kālam bhojanam kartum ucitam, 38 yataḥ kathinaṃ bhojanam yat tvam svīkṛtam, 39 tava bhojanālayaṃ prati saṃrakṣaṇam api apeksate.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
40 Apri la mente a quel ch’io ti paleso 41 e fermalvi entro; ché non fa scïenza, 42 sanza lo ritenere, avere inteso.
query.error: **English:** 40 Open your mind to what I reveal to you 41 and fix it within; for without retaining it, 42 having heard is not knowledge.
query.result: 40 Yat te prakāśayāmi tad vivekaṃ kuru 41 antaś ca dhāraya; śravaṇam eva hi 42 anādarād vijñānam na bhavati.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
43 Due cose si convegnono a l’essenza 44 di questo sacrificio: l’una è quella 45 di che si fa; l’altr’ è la convenenza.
query.error: **English:** 43 Two things are appropriate to the essence 44 of this sacrifice: one is that 45 of which it is made; the other is the appropriateness.
query.result: 43 Dve vastūny asya havyasya 44 Sāram āhus tamasvidaḥ 45 Tatrānyad yatnato dadyāt

query.prompt:

query.result: 46 Ayam uttamā na kadācid vināśyate 47 Yady apravartitā; asyāś ca paryāyeṇa 48 Upari evaṃ niścitam ucyate:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
49 però necessitato fu a li Ebrei 50 pur l’offerere, ancor ch’alcuna offerta 51 sì permutasse, come saver dei.
query.error: **English:** 49 therefore it was necessary for the Hebrews 50 to offer it, even though some other offering 51 was substituted, as you should know.
query.result: 49 Ata eva Hebhyas āvaśyakam ājñaptam 50 Idam eva nivedanam, yady api anyad 51 Nivedanam parivartyeta, yathā tvam vetsi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
52 L’altra, che per materia t’è aperta, 53 puote ben esser tal, che non si falla 54 se con altra materia si converta.
query.error: **English:** 52 The other, which is open to you because of your nature, 53 can indeed be such that you will not err 54 if it is transformed with another nature.
query.result: 52 Aparā, yā tava prakṛtyā te upagatā, 53 sā khalu tathāvidhā bhavitum arhati, yathā na bhramyasi 54 yadi anyayā prakṛtyā sā parivartate.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 58 Sarvāṇi ca parivartanāni mūḍhā manyase, 59 Yadi vastvantarīkṣe nyastam 60 Ṣaḍke catur iva na saṃgṛhṇāti.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 61 Paro yad vastu yāvad bhāratam 62 Svasyaiva guṇataḥ sarva tulām atiricyate, 63 Na tat kasyacid anyena vyayena santuṣyate.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
73 Siate, Cristiani, a muovervi più gravi: 74 non siate come penna ad ogne vento, 75 e non crediate ch’ogne acqua vi lavi.

query.result: 73 Bhavatha, Kristīyāḥ, calitum adhika-guru-bhārāḥ: 74 mā bhavatha yathā pakṣaḥ sarva-vāta-vegena, 75 ca na viśvasata yathā sarvam ambhaḥ śodhayati tvām.

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.error: **English:** 76 You have the New and the Old Testament, 77 and the shepherd of the Church who guides you; 78 let this suffice for your salvation.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.error: **English:** 79 If evil greed cries out to you for something else, 80 be men, and not senseless sheep, 81 so that the Jew will not laugh at you among yourselves!

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.error: **English:** 88 Her silence and her changing countenance 89 could silence my eager mind, 90 which already had new questions before it;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
91 e sì come saetta che nel segno 92 percuote pria che sia la corda queta, 93 così corremmo nel secondo regno.
query.error: **English:** 91 and just as an arrow that strikes the target 92 before the bowstring is still, 93 so we sped into the second realm.
query.result: 91 yathā ca śaraḥ lakṣye 92 patati pūrvam eva yathā dhanuḥśaraṇī śāntā bhavet, 93 tathā vayam dvitīye loke praveśikāmaḥ abhavam.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 94 Tatrāhaṃ mama strīṃ tathā prahṛṣṭām apaśyam, 95 Yathā tadākāśaprakāśe sthitā, 96 Yena grahaḥ adhikaṃ prakāśamānaḥ abhavat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
97 E se la stella si cambiò e rise, 98 qual mi fec’ io che pur da mia natura 99 trasmutabile son per tutte guise!
query.error: **English:** 97 And if the star changed and laughed, 98 what did I do, who by my very nature 99 am changeable in all guises!
query.result: 97 Eva ca yadi tārā parivartate sma ca hasati sma, 98 katham aham akāram yaḥ svabhāvataḥ eva 99 sarvarūpeṇaḥ parivartanaśīlaḥ asmi!

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
100 Come ’n peschiera ch’è tranquilla e pura 101 traggonsi i pesci a ciò che vien di fori 102 per modo che lo stimin lor pastura,
query.error: **English:** 100 As in a fishpond that is tranquil and pure, 101 the fish are drawn to what comes from outside, 102 so that they think it is their food,
query.result: 100 Yathā nadi-hradaḥ yaḥ śāntaḥ viśuddhaś ca asti, 101 tatra bahiḥ āgataṃ kiṃcid āhāram manyamānāḥ, 102 matsyaḥ āgacchanti,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
103 sì vid’ io ben più di mille splendori 104 trarsi ver’ noi, e in ciascun s’udia: 105 «Ecco chi crescerà li nostri amori».
query.error: **English:** 103 so I saw well more than a thousand splendors 104 drawn towards us, and in each one could be heard: 105 "Behold, one who will increase our loves."
query.result: 103 tathā aham api sahasrādhhikaṃ prakāśān paśyāmi 104 asmākam abhimukham āgacchataḥ, tataś ca ekaikaḥ śabdaḥ śrūyate sma: 105 "Paśya yaḥ asmākam premāṇi vardhayati."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
106 E sì come ciascuno a noi venìa, 107 vedeasi l’ombra piena di letizia 108 nel folgór chiaro che di lei uscia.
query.error: **English:** 106 And just as each one came toward us, 107 we could see the shade full of joy 108 in the bright radiance that issued from it.
query.result: 106 Evaṃ ca yaḥ yaḥ asmābhiḥ saha āgacchati sma, 107 Saḥ saḥ chāyā pūrṇā hṛṣyateḥ dṛśyate sma, 108 Tasyāḥ prakāśe sphuṭe yasyaḥ asmāt niḥsṛtaḥ āsīt.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
109 Pensa, lettor, se quel che qui s’inizia 110 non procedesse, come tu avresti 111 di più savere angosciosa carizia;

query.result: 112 evaṃ ca tvam eva drakṣyasi katham etebhyaḥ 113 mayi āsīt teṣāṃ sthitīn śrotum icchā, 114 yathā me netrabhyām abhivyaktāḥ āsīt.

118 del lume che per tutto il ciel si spazia 119 noi semo accesi; e però, se disii 120 di noi chiarirti, a tuo piacer ti sazia».

query.prompt:

121 Così da un di quelli spirti pii 122 detto mi fu; e da Beatrice: «Dì, dì 123 sicuramente, e credi come a dii».
query.error: **English:** 121 Thus one of those blessed spirits 122 spoke to me; and Beatrice: "Speak, speak 123 confidently, and believe as if to a god."
query.result: 121 Evam ekena tena ātmānām ātmavatām 122 Ucyamāne mama; tathā ca Bhadrā: "Bruhi, bruhi 123 Niścitam, viśvasa ca kuru yathā devatāyām."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
124 «Io veggio ben sì come tu t’annidi 125 nel proprio lume, e che de li occhi il traggi, 126 perch’ e’ corusca sì come tu ridi;

127 ma non so chi tu se’, né perché aggi, 128 anima degna, il grado de la spera 129 che si vela a’ mortai con altrui raggi».
